title: Reach Out Worldwide (ROWW) and Langham Hotel Donate to the City of Pasadena to Aid Families Affected by Eaton Fire
content: The City of Pasadena partnering with the disaster relief organization, Reach Out Worldwide (ROWW), to help aid the victims of the Eaton Fire. The Langham Hotel also donated furniture to those impacted by the fire. Volunteers are also distributing care packages and supplies to the fire victims.
